TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IReadableByteChannel implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.IO.ICloseable, class Java.Nio.Channels.IChannel, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: A ReadableByteChannel is a type of that can read bytes.

remarks.para: A ReadableByteChannel is a type of that can read bytes.

Read operations are synchronous on a ReadableByteChannel, that is, if a read is already in progress on the channel then subsequent reads will block until the first read completes. It is undefined whether non-read operations will block.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 Read(class Java.Nio.ByteBuffer buffer) cil managed

Docs.param: the byte buffer to receive the bytes.
Docs.summary: Reads bytes from the channel into the given buffer.

remarks.para: Reads bytes from the channel into the given buffer.
The maximum number of bytes that will be read is the number of bytes in the buffer when the method is invoked. The bytes will be read into the buffer starting at the buffer's current .
The call may block if other threads are also attempting to read from the same channel.
Upon completion, the buffer's position is updated to the end of the bytes that were read. The buffer's is not changed.

Docs.exception: if another thread closes the channel during the read.
if another thread interrupts the calling thread while the operation is in progress. The interrupt state of the calling thread is set and the channel is closed.
another I/O error occurs, details are in the message.
if the channel was not opened for reading.
